content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When youâ€™re working from home, schedule your daily activities just like you would do when you were working at the office place.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Example: Dress nicely, take your coffee break when you used to do so, do some stretches, talk to colleagues etc. We usually feel safe and comfortable when following our daily routine.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":45264,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0977a733-6c14-45e7-9eed-8e071756e15e/111.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0977a733-6c14-45e7-9eed-8e071756e15e/111.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"111.JPG\",\"name\":\"111.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0977a733-6c14-45e7-9eed-8e071756e15e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":825,\"height\":342},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
